source: TEXT_CMNDEFSKYISLANDLOTTERYEXCHANGESHOP_00382_TALK_ACTOR<tab>Greetings, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! I am a locksmith by trade, and decided to set up shop here when I heard folk were bringing back locked boxes from the Diadem. I'd be happy to put my skills to work for you...should you happen to need them.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFSKYISLANDLOTTERYEXCHANGESHOP_00382_TALK_ACTOR<tab>Ich bin auf das Öffnen von vertrackten Schlössern spezialisiert. Bring mir eine Schließkassette und ich öffne sie für dich.
